I would like to add some crawl profiles that would be available immediately=
 after installing Heritrix without any additional steps by the person doing=
 the install.

How are profiles added at build time for Heritrix1?  src/con=
f/profiles/default/ exists but is not present in the downloadable distribut=
ion at sf.net (and neither is the conf/profiles/ directory created after ex=
panding the dist).  

(Building with maven1 produces a tar.gz that is also =
missing the conf/profiles/ directory.)

Is conf/profiles/ and conf/profiles=
/default/ created lazily at runtime? 


Paul
